name: Society | Banal [1]
description: we live in symbols.  Our environment is a representation of ourselves.  the symbols respond to each other, complement, and also identify the people around them. In the Indonesian equivalent, 'banal' means something that is repetitive.  This repetition is a symptom of the birth of a symbol (apart from a positive and negative perspective) which becomes an additional identification (if not the only one) to identify a social - cultural - political situation of humans.  this is important to know to recognize humans in this age of industrialism.
